name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with over 10 years of experience in implementing cloud-native architectures and CI/CD practices, proficient in managing infrastructure using **AWS**, **GCP**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Packer**, **Docker**, and **Jenkins**. Expert in developing robust, high-performing backend systems with **Python** and automation tools while enhancing operational efficiencies through applied knowledge of **Bash**, **Git**, **Ruby**, **Node**, **Golang**, and **Java**. Demonstrated success in leveraging monitoring and performance tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Graphite** in high-stakes environments for notable organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure as code management, ensuring streamlined deployments and configurations for multiple environments across **AWS** and **GCP** cloud platforms.
Implemented CI/CD practices using **Jenkins** and **Docker** for automated build and release pipelines, reducing deployment times by **40%**.
Engineered monitoring and alerting solutions with **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, resulting in a **30%** improvement in system uptime and availability.
Developed backend services using **Python** and swift scripting in **Bash** to automate operational tasks and enhance system reliability.
Managed container orchestration using **Kubernetes**, leading containerization efforts that improved application scalability and resource utilization by **25%**.
Facilitated collaboration across cross-functional teams to enhance system integration, compliance, and security best practices, particularly through the integration of **OAuth2** for authentication.
Conducted regular security assessments to identify vulnerabilities and ensured incident response strategies were in place and adhered to best practices and industry standards.

Utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, facilitating the deployment of scalable microservices on **Azure App Services** for consistent environments across **9** cloud applications.
Engineered **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins** and **Git** to automate deployments, improving delivery speed by **30%**.
Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI**, enhancing document workflows and user onboarding processes, which reduced onboarding time by **25%**.
Created event-driven microservices with **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial transactions, achieving processing times under **5 seconds** per transaction.
Designed and implemented data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, streamlining operations and ensuring timely reporting.
Performed security audits and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication, ensuring compliance with industry standards and enhancing data security.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, contributing to successful release management across multiple projects.

Leveraged **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Docker** to architect and deploy scalable backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, successfully supporting over **100** concurrent users.
Utilized **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, ensuring high availability and efficient resource management across multiple environments with **99.9%** uptime.
Engineered real-time price feed processors with **Python**, **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, providing instantaneous trading data for high-frequency transactions with latency under **100 ms**.
Collaborated with frontend teams to integrate user data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, enhancing the user experience and increasing engagement metrics by over **30%**.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Jenkins** and **Git**, resulting in a deployment frequency increase from monthly to **weekly**.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, effectively optimizing backend task execution and process management for routine jobs.
Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including MiFID II and GDPR, by integrating **Ansible** for configuration management and security automation.
Developed comprehensive test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, enhancing software reliability and reducing bug reports during the release phase by **60%**.
